string.text: You can hold {LEAVE_AREA_KEY} to leave the current area.
Choose if circle map notifications will be shown on the right side on campaign map.
Clan Member Death Possibility in Battles
Choose if the heroes are able to age and reproduce.
This option cannot be changed later.
You can leave the training field by holding {LEAVE_KEY}{newline}You can return at any time from the campaign map.
This option can only be changed in character creation.

Keeping a number of horses in your inventory may speed up your party considerably, since they'll increase your carrying capacity and footmen will ride spare horses. Pack horses and mules are only useful for carrying cargo though.
Enable auto allocation of perks for members in your clan.
Ironman mode limits you to a single save file and automatically saves when you quit the game.
Received damage ratio to your character.
New kingdom name:{newline} - Cannot include digits.{newline} - Cannot be longer than {MAX_LETTER_COUNT} characters.{newline} - Cannot be shorter than {MIN_LETTER_COUNT} characters.
Received damage ratio to your allies that are not under your command.
The amount of extra chance for you to succeed in persuasion.
When you are in a town or village scene, holding down {MISSION_INDICATORS_KEY} shows markers on important people and interest points.
Determine the difficulty of the combat AI.
When you are looking at tooltip, you can press {EXTEND_KEY} to see an extended version of the tooltip.
The amount of extra troops that you can recruit from notables.
The amount of bonus movement speed for your party on the campaign map.
Skips tutorial at the beginning of the game.
Select a difficulty preset to change all of the difficulty options.
Member needs to be in player's party in order to do this action.
The possibility for your clan members to die after being knocked down in battle.
In game windows, you can open the encyclopedia entry for an item by pressing {ENCYCLOPEDIA_SHORTCUT}. This works for troop portraits, town icons, and most other elements.
Received damage ratio to your troops.
Enable Right Side Circle Map Notifications
Sets the interval of time between autosaves.
